name: Remote Sensing
body:
Information on the individual projects at [https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing): ### General Information **[NPI satellite archive [Internal]](http://wiki.npolar.no/wiki/index.php/Information_about_the_NPI_satellite_archive)**
**[Image Processing Software](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Image-Processing-Software)**
**[Radarsat Flerbruksavtale[Internal]] (http://wiki.npolar.no/wiki/index.php/Data_from_Radarsat-2_flerbruksavtale)**
### Routine Processing **[Processing Routine for Incoming Projects](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Processing-Routines)**
**[Antarctic Field Processing] (https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Antarctic-Field-Processing)**
**[Lance Field Processing] (https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Lance-Field-Processing)**
### Projects **Sea Ice:**
**[Ice Chart Processing (met.no-charts)](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/IceChartProcessing)**
**[Sea Ice Frequency](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Sea-Ice-Frequency)**
**[Shine](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Shine)**
**Land Ice:**
**[Dronning Maud Land](https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Dronning-Maud-Land)**
**[Lake Ice Svalbard] (https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Lake-Ice-Svalbard)**
**[Glacier Area Outline] (https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/Glacier-Area-Outline)**
**[CryoClim] (https://github.com/npolar/RemoteSensing/wiki/CryoClim)**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
